name: Youtube for dark rooms
description:
I made this Style for dark rooms, or if you just want something that's easier on the eyes.

I'm using Opera Zoom at 110%

If you have any problems, or suggestions let me know.

If you like the style please Like and Share it.
additional_info:
Looks like I was wrong, and it was a browser update that screwed up my style, after a reboot, everything went back to normal.

Well, looks like I wasn't wrong, it just happened a week or so later. Anyway I've fixed it again.

I have the video default to theater mode like. So it fills the browser screen.

One thing though, You have to set your browser zoom for youtube to 110% to have the video correct.

If anyone is having problems with this, let me know in comments, and tell me exactly what your problem might be, and I'll see if I can correct it.

Update, I found that making the normal video large all the time, screwed with other sites like reddit, making the video off center. So, I dropped the normal change, and fixed theater mode to fill the browser window like before. If anyone has any problems let me know.

Updated, fix Theater Mode.

Don't know if it was just me, but I fixed Theater Mode again. I use Opera Browser.

Fix a word break when you make a comment, also made the font bigger. My eyes aren't getting any younger.
